description: A comprehensive course covering fundamental algorithms and their applications.

topics.title: Introduction to Algorithms
topics.content: Basic concepts and importance of algorithms in computer science.

subtopics.title: Asymptotic Notations
subtopics.content: Big O, Big Omega, and Big Theta notations.

topics.title: Sorting Algorithms
topics.content: Various sorting algorithms and their efficiency.

subtopics.title: Quick Sort
subtopics.content: Efficient sorting algorithm with average case O(n log n).

topics.title: Searching Algorithms
topics.content: Different searching algorithms and their applications.

subtopics.title: Binary Search
subtopics.content: Efficient search algorithm for sorted data.

topics.title: Greedy Algorithms
topics.content: Algorithms that make locally optimal choices.
